ave a round face, sharply defined eyebrows, long eyelashes, a bulbous nose with upturned nostrils, a long space between the nose and upper lip (philtrum), and a small mouth with thick lips. These facial differences become less apparent in adulthood. Intelligence is unaffected in this disorder, and life expectancy is generally normal.",GHR,acromicric dysplasia
How many people are affected by acromicric dysplasia ?,Acromicric dysplasia is a rare disorder; its prevalence is unknown.,GHR,acromicric
